name: Tribrigade Airborne
text: Target 1 Beast, Beast-Warrior, or Winged Beast monster you control; Special Summon 1 Beast, Beast-Warrior, or Winged-Beast monster from your Deck, whose ATK is less than or equal to the targeted monster's, and is a different Type, but negate its effects until the end of this turn, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Link Monsters. You can only activate 1 "Tribrigade Airborne" per turn.
